Demo3 - Usage of QWorkspace inside qmdiTabWidget

Since Version 0.0.3 you can add into a qmdiTabWidget a normal QWorkspace. If you add to the workspace any widget which also derive qmdiClient, and then each time a new window is selected on the workspace, it's menus are merged in and out from the main window.

This feature has been written originally by Nox PasNox (pasnox@gmail.com).
